frontmatter.title: CNCF Honors Innovators and Defenders with 2025 Community Awards at KubeCon + CloudNativeCon North America
frontmatter.subtitle: CNCF recognizes community leaders across the cloud native ecosystem, including Layer5 founder Lee Calcote with the inaugural Outstanding Mentor Award.
frontmatter.author: The Newsroom
frontmatter.description: CNCF’s 2025 Community Awards at KubeCon + CloudNativeCon North America spotlights contributors, end users, mentors, and community heroes, with Layer5 founder Lee Calcote honored for his mentorship leadership.
